name: Launch
flavor: An object is forced to travel along the Path.

purposeDescriptions.low: gently sweeps up a nearby object of the caster's choice and sends it along the Path
purposeDescriptions.mid: drags along a nearby object of the caster's choice and flings it down the Path
purposeDescriptions.high: shreds a nearby object of the caster's choice as it catapults down the Path
purposeDescriptions.invLow: gently swaps places with a faraway object
purposeDescriptions.invMid: yanks at a distant object to trade places with it
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: launches all objects it touches towards its origin point
